title: Pennsylvania
prompt: An overhead view of a worn wooden kitchen table in soft morning light, scattered with community health pamphlets, a cup of coffee, and handwritten notes about clinic hoursâ€”a pair of weathered hands resting on the table edge, with a window framing distant rolling Appalachian hills and bare autumn trees.
